challengePeriod.title: Challenge period
challengePeriod.description: The number of blocks that PISA has to respond if an event is noticed.

contractAddress.title: Contract address
contractAddress.description: The address of the external contract to which the data will be submitted.

customerAddress.title: Customer address
customerAddress.description: The address of the customer hiring PISA.

customerSig.title: Customer signature
customerSig.description: The customers signature for this appointment

data.title: Data
data.description: The data to be submitted to the external contract.

endBlock.title: End block
endBlock.description: The last block in which the appointment is still valid.

eventABI.title: Event ABI
eventABI.description: The human readable ABI (https://blog.ricmoo.com/human-readable-contract-abis-in-ethers-js-141902f4d917) of the event that triggers a response.

eventArgs.title: Event arguments
eventArgs.description: The topic arguments for the address specified in the abi.

gasLimit.title: Gas limit
gasLimit.description: The amount of gas that will be supplied when calling the external contract. Maximum is 6 million.

id.title: Id
id.description: A unique id, chosen by the customer.

jobId.title: Job counter
jobId.description: A counter used to replace appointments of the same id, but lower counter.

paymentHash.title: Payment hash
paymentHash.description: The hash received during payment. Use `0xfc1624bdc50da30f2ea37b7debabeac1f6166db013c5880dcf63907b04199138` for free access.

preCondition.title: Pre-condition
preCondition.description: The pre-condition that must be satisfied before PISA can respond.

postCondition.title: Post-condition
postCondition.description: The post-condition to be executed after Pisa executes the call data.

refund.title: Refund
refund.description: The amount to be refunded in case of failure (wei). Maximum can be 0.1 ether = 100000000000000000.

startBlock.title: Start block
startBlock.description: The block at which this appointment starts.
